verses.name: Deuteronomy 19:15
verses.text: One witness shall not rise up against a man for any iniquity, or for any sin, in any sin that he sinneth: at the mouth of two witnesses, or at the mouth of three witnesses, shall the matter be established.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 19:16
verses.text: If a false witness rise up against any man to testify against him that which is wrong;

verses.name: Deuteronomy 19:17
verses.text: Then both the men, between whom the controversy is, shall stand before the Lord, before the priests and the judges, which shall be in those days;
